COMMAND.name: show wred
COMMAND.ACTION:
if test "${name}" = "" ; then
python $SONIC_CLI_ROOT/sonic-cli-wred.py get_sonic_wred_profile_sonic_wred_profile_wred_profile show_wred.j2
else
python $SONIC_CLI_ROOT/sonic-cli-wred.py get_sonic_wred_profile_sonic_wred_profile_wred_profile_wred_profile_list ${name} show_wred.j2
fi

COMMAND.name: random-detect color
COMMAND.ACTION:
if test "${color_select}" = "red" ; then
python $SONIC_CLI_ROOT/sonic-cli-wred.py patch_sonic_wred_profile_sonic_wred_profile_wred_profile_wred_profile_list_red_min_threshold ${prof_id} ${min-threshold} WaitShow
python $SONIC_CLI_ROOT/sonic-cli-wred.py patch_sonic_wred_profile_sonic_wred_profile_wred_profile_wred_profile_list_red_max_threshold ${prof_id} ${max-threshold} WaitShow
python $SONIC_CLI_ROOT/sonic-cli-wred.py patch_sonic_wred_profile_sonic_wred_profile_wred_profile_wred_profile_list_red_drop_rate ${prof_id} ${max-drop-rate}
elif test "${color_select}" = "green" ; then
python $SONIC_CLI_ROOT/sonic-cli-wred.py patch_sonic_wred_profile_sonic_wred_profile_wred_profile_wred_profile_list_green_min_threshold ${prof_id} ${min-threshold} WaitShow
python $SONIC_CLI_ROOT/sonic-cli-wred.py patch_sonic_wred_profile_sonic_wred_profile_wred_profile_wred_profile_list_green_max_threshold ${prof_id} ${max-threshold} WaitShow
python $SONIC_CLI_ROOT/sonic-cli-wred.py patch_sonic_wred_profile_sonic_wred_profile_wred_profile_wred_profile_list_green_drop_rate ${prof_id} ${max-drop-rate}
else
python $SONIC_CLI_ROOT/sonic-cli-wred.py patch_sonic_wred_profile_sonic_wred_profile_wred_profile_wred_profile_list_yellow_min_threshold ${prof_id} ${min-threshold} WaitShow
python $SONIC_CLI_ROOT/sonic-cli-wred.py patch_sonic_wred_profile_sonic_wred_profile_wred_profile_wred_profile_list_yellow_max_threshold ${prof_id} ${max-threshold} WaitShow
python $SONIC_CLI_ROOT/sonic-cli-wred.py patch_sonic_wred_profile_sonic_wred_profile_wred_profile_wred_profile_list_yellow_drop_rate ${prof_id} ${max-drop-rate}
fi
